As the sphere go away with the body, a small flicker of light
carefully wat=
ches them go away. Certain that his body would not
survive, Azureblade inve=
rted his spark polarity so as to be
undetectable and left its hulk. Of cour=
se, it could do nothing, but
his mission had been a success. He proved the =
Minions they were as
mortal as the rest of Transformers were.

Unhindered b=
y gravity, the spark left the moon as soon as it safely
could and went towa=
rds Earth at speeds only energy could manage.
